inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Handaxe', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Battleaxe', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Waraxe', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Greataxe', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Axes
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with handaxes, battleaxes, waraxes, and greataxes.
